text: 19:15 Onger Akaba 2:9; Aisaia 63:3; Joel 3:13; 2 Tesalonika 2:8; Akar Mogomem 1:16; 2:27; 4:8; 12:5; 14:19-20Ezɨ mɨdorozir sabar ghumtɨzir mam gumazir men faragha zuir kamɨn akamɨn ikegha, azenan izi. A mɨdorozir sabar kamɨn nguibar igharazibav sogh me abɨnam. Egh a gavgavim itir ainɨn aghorimɨn suiragh egh gumazamizibagh ativamin gavgavim ikiam. Egh a, dagɨar mɨner bar ekiamɨn aven me wainɨn ovɨziba mɨrmɨri moghɨn, Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itimɨn anɨngagharir arazir ekiam akagham.
